channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Robotic dog mimics mammals for superior mobility on land and in water
item.description: A team of researchers has unveiled a cutting-edge Amphibious Robotic Dog capable of roving across both land and water with remarkable efficiency.

item.title: AI-designed DNA controls genes in healthy mammalian cells for first time

item.title: All of the biggest U.S. cities are sinking
item.description: A new study of the 28 most populous U.S. cities finds that all are sinking to one degree or another. The cities include not just those on the coasts, ...
